text: wqlna lh: khudh biadik huzmt shmarykh, fadrib biha zawjak 'ibrarana bymynk, fala thnth; 'iidh 'uqsim lydrbnnaha miayat jaldat 'iidha shfah allh, lmma ghadab ealayha min 'amr yasir 'athna' mrdh, wakanat aimra'at salht, frhmha allah wrhmh bhdhh alftwa. 'iinaa wajadna 'ayuwb sabrana ealaa albla', niem aleabd hw, 'iinah rjjae 'iilaa taeat allh
